resources.string: Q. I have an issue, which i can\'t solve. I have a navigation bar, which is set up as fragments. I\'ll attach the code for??

Ans : perhaps the R.id.kontaktButton is defined in the R.layout.fragment_kontakt fragment layout, but we are finding it in the main layout?\n at com.example.yusuf.cxweb.MainActivity.onNavigationItemSelected(MainActivity
Q. Sir I have doubt in the implementation of the tab layout as whenever i shift my layout it overlapses my current tab help!!

Ans : it is very easy to solve frnd you just need to add this two concept to your app first is the fragmrnt concept and the second being how u will be handling activities in the system folder only it will solve your problem
Q. SIR my doubt is about the concept of fragment can u guyz please upload the video and make me understand ? The basic concept of fragments?
